title: Daily Briefing: Trump seeks an end to 'inglorious' Russia-Ukraine war
shortDescription: Trump meets with Zelenskyy after Putin call and more news to start your Friday.

title: Portland resists Trump's troops with dancing frogs, naked bikers
shortDescription: In Portland, Oregon, public sentiment runs strongly against Trump's plan to send in the National Guard. The city is fighting back in offbeat ways.

title: Arizona Young Republicans respond after racist chat leak
shortDescription: The scandal has split the GOP, with some Republicans condemning the leaked comments and others, including Vice President JD Vance, downplaying them.

title: Trump keeps prosecuting political opponents. Here’s who might be next.
shortDescription: Here’s a partial rundown of who else Trump has mentioned as being on his political hit list, and why.

title: In California, why voters are using a redistricting fight to push back
shortDescription: California voters are headed to the polls to cast ballots on Prop. 50, Gov. Gavin Newsom's redistricting plan aimed at pushing back on Republicans.

title: CA voters split on Proposition 50
shortDescription: California voters react to Proposition 50, which could shift redistricting power to lawmakers.

title: Ohio congressman says swastika flag in his office was a 'ruse'
shortDescription: Rep. Dave Taylor said his staffer didn't knowingly display the altered American flag.

title: Trump expands IVF access and cuts drug prices
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a plan to expand IVF access, including employer coverage option and major fertility drug discounts.

title: Who is John Bolton? Ex-Trump adviser indicted in documents probe
shortDescription: Former national security advisor during President Trump’s first term, John Bolton was indicted on Oct. 16 as part of a classified documents probe.

title: Trump's deployment of National Guard troops faces backlash
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's deployment of National Guard troops to US cities raises questions about the role of the military in civic life.

title: Trump critic John Bolton indicted in documents investigation
shortDescription: Ex-National Security Adviser John Bolton, a longtime critic of President Donald Trump, was indicted amid a probe of mishandling classified documents.

title: Trump seeks to lower costs, expand access to IVF treatment
shortDescription: Trump's plan calls for lowering the cost of fertility treatments and eliminating red tape for employers who want to expand access for workers.

title: Trump barred from deploying troops to his Chicago 'Midway Blitz' plan
shortDescription: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit's decision upholds a temporary restraining order granted by a federal judge in Chicago.

title: ¿Abuso de poder? Juez acusa a Trump de usar ayuda por desastres como chantaje
shortDescription: Juez acusa a Trump de chantaje: condicionó ayuda por desastres a cooperación migratoria

title: Trump's deployment of National Guard sparks debate
shortDescription: As President Donald Trump pushes to deploy more National Guard troops to US cities, Americans grapple with show of military might.

title: What is Trump’s approval rating? Negative in all 2024 swing states
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has picked on key states with the National Guard and redistricting battles. What is his approval rating in California, Illinois

title: President Trump to meet Putin in Budapest
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he’ll meet Russian President Vladimir Putin in Budapest to negotiate Ukraine peace after phone call.

title: Arc de Trump: President Trump reveals 3-D model
shortDescription: President Trump showed plans for a new real estate project at a dinner to thank donors for his $250 million ballroom at the White House.
